detectors.description: Contract Pickle_Finance_V2 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pickle_Finance_V2.sol#14-75) is not in CapWords

Pickle_Finance_V2.slitherConstructorVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pickle_Finance_V2.sol#14-75) uses literals with too many digits:
	- initialSupply = 100000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pickle_Finance_V2.sol#16)
